edits.text: font-family: "JetBrains Mono Nerd Font", "Iosevka Nerd Font", "Fira Code", sans-serif;
/* Floating shadow effect for the bar */

{ "layer": "top", "position": "top", "height": 30, "margin-top": 10, "margin-left": 10, "margin-right": 10, "margin-bottom": 0, "spacing": 8, "modules-left": ["hyprland/workspaces"], "modules-center": ["clock"], "modules-right": ["network", "cpu", "memory", "pulseaudio", "battery"], "hyprland/workspaces": { "disable-scroll": true, "all-outputs": true, "format": "{icon}", "persistent-workspaces": { "*": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] }, "format-icons": { "1": "", "2": "", "3": "", "4": "", "5": "", "urgent": "", "focused": "", "default": "" } }, "clock": { "format": " {:%H:%M:%S}", "interval": 1, "tooltip-format": "{calendar}", "calendar": { "mode": "year", "mode-mon-col": 3, "weeks-pos": "right", "on-scroll": 1, "on-click-right": "mode", "format": { "months": "{}", "days": "{}", "weeks": "W{}", "weekdays": "{}", "today": "{}" } } }, "network": { "format": "", "format-wifi": " {signalStrength}%", "format-ethernet": " Connected", "format-disconnected": "Áùä Disconnected", "tooltip-format": "{ifname}\n{ipaddr}/{cidr}", "tooltip-format-wifi": "{ifname} @ {essid}\nIP: {ipaddr}/{cidr}\nSignal: {signalStrength}%", "tooltip-format-ethernet": "{ifname}\nIP: {ipaddr}/{cidr}", "on-click": "nm-applet" }, "cpu": { "format": " {usage}%", "interval": 1, "tooltip": true, "tooltip-format": "CPU: {usage}%" }, "memory": { "format": " {used:.1f}GB", "interval": 1, "tooltip": true, "tooltip-format": "Memory: {used:.1f}GB / {total:.1f}GB ({percentage}%)" }, "pulseaudio": { "format": "{icon} {volume}%", "format-muted": " Muted", "format-icons": { "headphone": "", "hands-free": "Û∞Çë", "headset": "Û∞Çë", "phone": "", "portable": "", "car": "", "default": ["", "", ""] }, "scroll-step": 5, "on-click": "pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ toggle", "on-scroll-up": "pactl set-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ +5%", "on-scroll-down": "pactl set-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ -5%", "tooltip": true, "tooltip-format": "Volume: {volume}%" }, "battery": { "format": "{icon} {capacity}%", "format-icons": ["", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""], "format-charging": " {capacity}%", "format-plugged": " {capacity}%", "states": { "warning": 30, "critical": 15 }, "tooltip": true, "tooltip-format": "Battery: {capacity}%\nTime: {time}" } }
font-family: "JetBrains Mono Nerd Font", "Iosevka Nerd Font", "Fira Code", monospace;
